snippet.title: You put your weed in there: FC Barcelona chocolates packed with drugs
snippet.description:
You put your weed in there: FC Barcelona chocolates packed with drugs by Ryan Rosenblatt on Apr 22 2014, 4:27p
Why can't I stop eating these chocolates? And why is Lionel Messi a panda in a tuxedo?

snippet.title: Real Madrid vs. Bayern Munich preview: Likely better than the other Champions League tie
snippet.description:
Real Madrid vs. Bayern Munich preview: Likely better than the other Champions League tie by Jack Sargeant on Apr 22 2014, 5:23p
The second Champions League semifinal kicks off at the Bernabéu on Wednesday, with Real Madrid hosting reigning champions Bayern Munich.

snippet.title: Cristiano Ronaldo trains, but Gareth Bale has the flu
snippet.description:
Cristiano Ronaldo trains, but Gareth Bale has the flu by Zach Woosley on Apr 21 2014, 11:32a
Real Madrid could have Ronaldo back for Wednesday's Champions League semifinal first leg, but Gareth Bale's status is now in doubt.

snippet.title: La Liga, Round 34 review: Atlético Madrid win again, Barcelona still alive for now
snippet.description:
La Liga, Round 34 review: Atlético Madrid win again, Barcelona still alive for now by Zach Woosley on Apr 21 2014, 5:56p
Atlético Madrid won again, Barcelona stayed alive, the race for fourth may come down to next week, and Real Betis are one loss from relegation.

snippet.title: La Liga, Round 34: Barcelona keeps title hopes alive with a comeback win over Athletic Bilbao
snippet.description:
La Liga, Round 34: Barcelona keeps title hopes alive with a comeback win over Athletic Bilbao by Zach Woosley on Apr 18 2014, 4:21p
It took two late goals from Lionel Messi and Pedro to ensured that Barcelona's title hopes would survive at least one more week.

snippet.title: Gareth Bale receives speeding ticket for his goal in Copa del Rey final
snippet.description:
Gareth Bale receives speeding ticket for his goal in Copa del Rey final by Ryan Rosenblatt on Apr 18 2014, 12:08p
Cops, man.

snippet.title: How much did Pep Guardiola contribute to Barcelona's downfall?
snippet.description:
How much did Pep Guardiola contribute to Barcelona's downfall? by Callum Hamilton on Apr 18 2014, 11:57a
Pep Guardiola's coaching led Barcelona to a treble in his debut season, but he didn't leave the Blaugrana better than he found them.

snippet.title: Barcelona lose Neymar, Jordi Alba for 4 weeks
snippet.description:
Barcelona lose Neymar, Jordi Alba for 4 weeks by Kevin McCauley on Apr 17 2014, 5:16p
Two of Barcelona's best players will be out for most of the rest of the season, and will struggle to make the season finale against Atlético Madrid.

snippet.title: Atlético Madrid vs. Elche: Preview, TV schedule and how to watch online
snippet.description:
Atlético Madrid vs. Elche: Preview, TV schedule and how to watch online by Zach Woosley on Apr 18 2014, 9:00a
With Real Madrid idle, Atlético have the chance to open up a six-point lead in the title race with a win over Elche.

snippet.title: Gareth Bale chats with ball
snippet.description:
Gareth Bale chats with ball by Andi Thomas on Apr 17 2014, 6:44a
Living the in future is weird.
